sentences.cn: “要多加小心!”——“一定会的，爸爸。再见。”
“爸爸？”——“什么事？”——“我今晚能用车吗？”

sentences.en: "There you go again, Dad, with your silly words."— 'Sorry. son.'
sentences.cn: “爸爸，又来了吧，又说傻话了。”——“对不起，儿子。”

sentences.en: "They play classic rock'n"roll,' states her boyfriend, "My dad digs them too."
sentences.cn: “他们演奏经典摇滚乐，”她的男朋友说道，“我爸爸也喜欢他们。”

sentences.en: Dad spoils me. He loves me. He sticks up for me.
sentences.cn: 爸爸很宠我，很爱我。他总是护着我。

sentences.en: Dad, I'm a grown woman. I know what I'm doing.
sentences.cn: 爸爸，我不再是个小女孩了，知道自己在做什么。

sentences.en: He is a hothead and a bully just like his dad.
sentences.cn: 他和他爸爸一样都是个恃强凌弱的莽夫。

sentences.en: My dad took me to the circus.
My dad was the most honest man I ever met.
sentences.cn: 爸爸是我所见过的最正直的人。

sentences.en: She lives with her mom and dad.
Ted's always been difficult, Mr Kemp — he takes after his dad.
sentences.cn: 肯普先生，特德一直很难相处——像他爸。

sentences.en: There's always tons of scrap paper in Dad's office.
sentences.cn: 爸爸的办公室里总有大量的废纸。

sentences.en: We waited for Mom and Dad to get home.
